name: zdsa

releases.name: v0.5.0
releases.body:
Doubly link list and updates to stack and queue function names

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zdsa/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body:
0.3.0 includes a dequeue structure. examples may be found in the tests

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zdsa/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
0.2.0 now includes queue, as well as more tests covering both stack and queue

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zdsa/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body:
0.1.0 contains a general stack implementeation, just an abstraction over
std.Arraylist, but with methods constraining it to a simple stack


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Jafagervik/zdsa/commits/v0.1.0
